Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights november 2011 clean comfortable included fridge hair dryer coffee maker slept hallways quiet stay breakfast included parking included 2 parking lots crescent street charge 20day typical montreal location 1 block st catherine st easy walk found front desk staff friendly helpful price pleased overall
